data: {"generalSituation":"With the band of clouds covering the coast of Guangdong thinning out, temperatures over the region will rise today. A fresh easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. The easterly airstream will moderate over the weekend. The weather will be mainly fine over Guangdong. It will be warm during the day, and relatively humid in the morning and at night. The northeast monsoon is expected to affect southern China early to midweek next week, it will be cloudier with temperatures falling slightly over the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260211","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 2 to 3.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Visibility relatively low in some areas at first.
